title: Flea data, manual tour on var 4
---

Standardized flea data

```{r, echo=F, results='hide'}
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(spinifex))
f_dat  <- rescale(flea[,1:6])
f_cat  <- as.factor(flea$species)
f_path <- save_history(f_dat, guided_tour(holes()))
f_bas  <- matrix(f_path[,, max(dim(f_path)[3])], ncol=2)
f_bas  <- tourr::rescale(f_bas)
f_mvar <- 4
```

```{r, echo=F}
play_manual_tour(data = f_dat, basis = f_bas, manip_var = f_mvar,
                 angle = .28, axes="bottomleft", cat_var = f_cat)
```
